price: Dan barang siapa yang Kami panjangkan umurnya, niscaya Kami kembalikan dia kepada kejadian(nya) 1272.  Maka apakah mereka tidak memikirkan?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: 1272.  Maksudnya, kembali menjadi lemah dan kurang akal.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
